thumb.title: 【夏アニメMAD】君の名は。× わがまま。『夏ノ幻』
thumb.description: 【Newユニット始動｜わがまま。】 Producer：iamSHUM / Vocal：メルナ 2025.08.05 Release | 西武園ゆうえんちテーマ曲1st Single「夏ノ幻」iTunes : https://itunes.apple.com/jp/album/natsu-no-maboroshi-single/1830843202?l=ja&ls=1&app=itunesSpotify : https://open.spotify.com/album/7lYMYLkxyZaLVvNLSXu7je?si=ItelvS7vQCaPJ1mpZZOM3w🔗 Streaming＆Download ▶︎ https://linkco.re/TdVa1dBE🔽わがまま。公式SNSYouTube : https://www.youtube.com/@wagamamamusicX : https://x.com/wagamama_musicTikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@wagamama_music?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pcInstagram : https://www.instagram.com/wagamama_music/✴️Producer：iamSHUMYoutube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCier45f5l9zyGJLH22JlBIQX : https://twitter.com/iamSHUMInstagram : https://www.instagram.com/iamshum_clmx/TikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@iamshum?lang=ja-JP✴️ Vocal : メルナ（わがまま。）X : https://x.com/Meluna_wagamama TikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@meluna_wagamamaVocal：メルナ ‪‪Words & Music：iamSHUM Guitar : AssH @assh335 Arrangement ：iamSHUMMix Engineer：iamSHUMMastering Engineer：iamSHUM#夏ノ幻 #わがまま #君の名は #MAD
